duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and authorize all services to members using expert knowledge of screening and clinical criteria.
Participate in the medical management of members in all product lines.
Promote the delivery of quality services at the most appropriate and cost-effective setting.
Act as the member advocate with an emphasis on education regarding managed care, disease management, etc.
Monitor member’s utilization patterns for identification of high risk and under/overuse of services.
Collaborate with medical directors and senior management on complex cases.

education_certification.credential: Valid current unrestrictive license in the state doing business in, in one of the following: LPN, LCSW, LMHC, LMSW, LMFT, LPC
